event_001.event_description: Starts an specific period in-game. Requires 'set_timer = true' so it will only resume other sequences after its completion.

event_002.event_description: Spawns a selected sequence of enemies. Also uses 'set_timer' as to keep a clean visual of the sequence without random enemies.

event_005.event_description: Spawns a mini boss. Can pause stage timer if required, and only resumes when it recieves a signal from the enemy.

event_006.event_description: Replica of event_001 to execute in another period of the stage. Probably will be repeated a lot

event_008.event_description: Spawns another selected sequence of enemies.

event_009.event_description: Acts as a smooth filler between previous events and the final boss. Doesn't need a 'timer_period' as the timer gets the needed values from the StageTimer itself

event_010.event_description: Always stops time, acts as a great threat to be overcome during stage. Can be final or not. Has the power to change certain aspects of the scene itself.
